event.description: Ian Kinsler singles on a line drive to right fielder Jeff Francoeur.
Elvis Andrus singles on a ground ball to left fielder Alex Gordon. Ian Kinsler to 2nd.
Josh Hamilton lines out to right fielder Jeff Francoeur. Ian Kinsler to 3rd.
Adrian Beltre singles on a ground ball to third baseman Yuniesky Betancourt. Ian Kinsler scores. Elvis Andrus scores. Adrian Beltre to 2nd. Throwing error by second baseman Johnny Giavotella.
Michael Young grounds out, shortstop Alcides Escobar to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Nelson Cruz singles on a line drive to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Adrian Beltre to 3rd.
David Murphy singles on a line drive to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Adrian Beltre scores. Nelson Cruz to 2nd.
Yorvit Torrealba grounds out, pitcher Bruce Chen to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Mitch Moreland grounds out to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Ian Kinsler singles on a line drive to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Elvis Andrus triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Jeff Francoeur. Ian Kinsler scores.
Josh Hamilton lines out to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Pitcher Change: Louis Coleman replaces Bruce Chen.
Adrian Beltre singles on a line drive to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Elvis Andrus scores.
Michael Young flies out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Nelson Cruz lines out to second baseman Johnny Giavotella.
David Murphy walks.
Yorvit Torrealba pops out to third baseman Yuniesky Betancourt.
With Mitch Moreland batting, David Murphy caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Salvador Perez to shortstop Alcides Escobar.
Pitcher Change: Mike Montgomery replaces Louis Coleman.
Mitch Moreland walks.
Ian Kinsler grounds into double play, third baseman Yuniesky Betancourt to second baseman Johnny Giavotella to first baseman Eric Hosmer. Mitch Moreland out at 2nd.
Elvis Andrus singles on a ground ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.

Michael Young lines out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, second baseman Johnny Giavotella to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
David Murphy strikes out swinging.
Dusty Brown pops out to shortstop Alcides Escobar.

Defensive Substitution: Chris Getz replaces second baseman Johnny Giavotella, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Clint Robinson replaces first baseman Eric Hosmer, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Mike Moustakas remains in the game as the designated hitter.
